title: The Bantu philosophy of "ubuntu" focuses on the power of community
author: Jonny Thomson
readable_title: The Bantu Philosophy of "Ubuntu" Focuses on the Power of Community
highlights: [{'id': 588335432, 'text': 'The poet, Gary Snyder, once wrote that we should each aim to “get famous within five miles.” Do not aim to have your name appear in Google searches, but to be known in houses up and down your street. Meet the neighbors, help fix that fence, go to community meetings, and wave at people in the street.', 'location': 6193, 'location_type': 'offset', 'note': '', 'color': '', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-29T17:14:32.256Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-29T17:14:32.274Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-29T17:14:32.274Z', 'external_id': '01h914mb7tnrryz4xgza010qs3', 'end_location': None, 'url': 'https://read.readwise.io/read/01h914mb7tnrryz4xgza010qs3', 'book_id': 31668752, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/588335432'}]

title: What Happened to Wirecutter?
author: Charlie Warzel
highlights: [{'id': 584974232, 'text': '*Wirecutter*’s trajectory is the story of what the internet does to most great ideas: It forces them to scale, and then others replicate the concepts at varying levels of quality until, eventually, an economic, algorithmic wildfire is burning. The original is consumed and left in a scarred landscape.', 'location': 20110, 'location_type': 'offset', 'note': '', 'color': '', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-23T19:58:53.318Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-23T19:58:53.340Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-23T19:58:53.340Z', 'external_id': '01h8hzmyw399wxwzsrsgbzte2d', 'end_location': None, 'url': 'https://read.readwise.io/read/01h8hzmyw399wxwzsrsgbzte2d', 'book_id': 31477729, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/584974232'}]

title: Radicle Civics — Building Proofs of Possibilities for a Civic Economy and Society
author: Dark Matter
readable_title: Radicle Civics — Building Proofs of Possibilities for a Civic Economy and Society
highlights: [{'id': 583396189, 'text': 'Looking through Eric Beinhocker’s lens of the “[ontology stack](https://online.ucpress.edu/gp/article-abstract/1/1/17578/112212/Toward-a-New-Ontological-Framework-for-the?redirectedFrom=fulltext)”, GDP unfolds itself as not *just* a metric, but the tip of the iceberg of a layered economic infrastructure with an embedded worldview: one that perceives and positions humans as rational, profit-maximising, disembedded beings.', 'location': 8570, 'location_type': 'offset', 'note': '', 'color': '', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-20T17:57:02.735Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-20T17:57:02.773Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-20T17:57:02.773Z', 'external_id': '01h8a1fps4gw333c6eqzq37kra', 'end_location': None, 'url': 'https://read.readwise.io/read/01h8a1fps4gw333c6eqzq37kra', 'book_id': 31377339, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/583396189'}, {'id': 583396376, 'text': 'As Edmund Burke cautioned the Enlightenment-inspired revolutionaries, “liberty, too, must be limited in order to be possessed.”', 'location': 9774, 'location_type': 'offset', 'note': '', 'color': '', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-20T17:58:06.927Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-20T17:58:06.949Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-20T17:58:06.949Z', 'external_id': '01h8a1hnjfa60tyrdfw08pwgt9', 'end_location': None, 'url': 'https://read.readwise.io/read/01h8a1hnjfa60tyrdfw08pwgt9', 'book_id': 31377339, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/583396376'}]

title: Rising from Existential Crisis: Life beyond calamity
author: Emmy van Deurzen
highlights: [{'id': 582132244, 'text': 'But the opposite is true: as soon as we create a two-tier world in which we seek to dominate, we become immediately caught up in the fear that we will be dominated by others, lose our advantage and be put down and suffer in turn.', 'location': 2381, 'location_type': 'location', 'note': '', 'color': 'yellow', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-18T04:56:00Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-18T14:57:09.778Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-18T14:57:09.779Z', 'external_id': None, 'end_location': None, 'url': None, 'book_id': 28282865, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/582132244'}, {'id': 582132245, 'text': 'We will be held hostage by the culture we join, because we will never enter it on a par with those who are established in it.', 'location': 2387, 'location_type': 'location', 'note': '', 'color': 'yellow', 'highlighted_at': '2023-08-18T04:56:00Z', 'created_at': '2023-08-18T14:57:09.779Z', 'updated_at': '2023-08-18T14:57:09.779Z', 'external_id': None, 'end_location': None, 'url': None, 'book_id': 28282865, 'tags': [], 'is_favorite': False, 'is_discard': False, 'readwise_url': 'https://readwise.io/open/582132245'}]
